tooltip.embed: It may take a few minutes to embed the page. Please wait...

controlRow.ephemeralModeActive: Ephemeral mode: chat won't be saved
controlRow.visionDisabledKnowledge: Disable Knowledge Search to use Vision

composer.connectHint: Connect to your tldw server in Settings to send messages.
composer.disconnectedPlaceholder: Connect to your tldw server in Settings to send messages and view media.
composer.tempChatConfirmContent: This will clear your current conversation. Messages won't be saved.
composer.tempChatClearedMessages: Temporary chat enabled. Previous messages cleared.
composer.clearQueueConfirmContent: This will delete {{count}} queued message(s) that haven't been sent yet.

notification.ingestSentDesc: Current page has been submitted for ingestion.
notification.processedLocalDesc: Processed content stored locally under Settings > Processed.
notification.transcriptionFallback: Transcription completed. Open Media in the Web UI to view it.

saveStatus.ephemeral: Ephemeral: Not saved, cleared on close
saveStatus.saveFailed: Failed to save chat to server
saveStatus.saveFailedDescription: Chat is now saving locally only. Check your connection and try again.

rag.disconnected: Connect to server to search knowledge base

hint.message: Search your knowledge base and insert results into your message.

errors.privateModeDescription: Firefox Private Mode does not support saving chat history. Temporary chat is enabled by default. More fixes coming soon.

connectionBanner.authErrorBody: Your server is reachable but the API key is wrong or missing.
connectionBanner.unreachableBody: Check that your server is running and accessible.
connectionBanner.noUrlBody: Add your server URL in Settings to get started.
connectionBanner.disconnectedBody: Open Settings to configure your server connection.
connectionBanner.setupBody: Complete the setup wizard in Settings to connect.

temporaryBadge.title: Temporary Chat
temporaryBadge.label: Temp
temporaryBadge.description: This chat won't be saved. Messages will be cleared when you close or start a new chat.
temporaryBadge.ariaLabel: Temporary chat mode is active. Click to toggle.
temporaryBadge.indicatorTooltip: Messages in this chat won't be saved
